reviewText: Save your money.  Mr. Banyans DVD is of low grade quality and not very insightful.  I have found better DVDs, at far more reasonable prices and have also used online sources which have a far greater legitimacy than Mr. Banyans DVD.  Lastly; Mr. Banyans DVD is nothing shy of a self-promoting gimmick to get you to either take his online or onsite courses.
good learning tool, and easy to follow instructions  What more can I say I still have it and watch it frequently
